name: YDRENAS COMMUNICATIONS AB
goal: Bolagets verksamhet är konsultverksamhet i form av analys, rådgivning och operativa insatser inom samhällsfrågor och kommunikation samt publicistisk verksamhet och därmed förenlig verksamhet.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union, Insurance Distribution Directive, IDD, MiFID2, IORP2, EMIR Refit, Pan-european Personal Pensions Product, PEPP, Solvency II Directive, CCP Recovery and Resolution, CRR/CRD, Sustainable finance, Fintech, CSDR, ESA review, Brexit, Customs Services.
